channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Identity Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Identity Manager

item.title: CVE-2018-1956|2024-08-05T04:14:39.464Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager 6.0.0 does not require that users should have strong passwords by default, which makes it easier for attackers to compromise user accounts. IBM X-Force ID: 153628.

item.title: CVE-2017-1405|2024-08-05T13:32:29.708Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager Virtual Appliance 7.0 processes patches, image backups and other updates without sufficiently verifying the origin and integrity of the code. IBM X-Force ID: 127392.

item.title: CVE-2017-1407|2024-08-05T13:32:30.238Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager Virtual Appliance 6.0 and 7.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 127394.

item.title: CVE-2018-1970|2024-08-05T04:14:39.489Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager 7.0.1 is vulnerable to a XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 153751.

item.title: CVE-2017-1362|2024-08-05T13:32:29.572Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager Adapters 6.0 and 7.0 stores user credentials in plain in clear text which can be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 126801.

item.title: CVE-2018-1968|2024-08-05T04:14:39.572Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager 7.0.1 discloses sensitive information to unauthorized users. The information can be used to mount further attacks on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 153749.

item.title: CVE-2018-1959|2024-08-05T04:14:39.583Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager 7.0.1 Virtual Appliance contains hard-coded credentials, such as a password or cryptographic key, which it uses for its own inbound authentication, outbound communication to external components, or encryption of internal data. IBM X-Force ID: 153633.

item.title: CVE-2018-1967|2024-08-05T04:14:39.523Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager 6.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 153748.

item.title: CVE-2018-2019|2024-08-05T04:14:39.564Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager 6.0.0 Virtual Appliance is vulnerable to a XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 155265.

item.title: CVE-2018-1962|2024-08-05T04:14:39.512Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager 7.0.1 Virtual Appliance does not invalidate session tokens when the logout button is pressed. The lack of proper session termination may allow attackers with local access to login into a closed browser session. IBM X-Force ID: 153658.

item.title: CVE-2017-1483|2024-08-05T13:32:29.611Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager Adapters 6.0 and 7.0 does not perform an authentication check for a critical resource or functionality allowing anonymous users access to protected areas. IBM X-Force ID: 128621.

item.title: CVE-2018-1453|2024-08-05T03:59:39.095Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager Virtual Appliance 7.0 allows an authenticated attacker to upload or transfer files of dangerous types that can be automatically processed within the environment. IBM X-Force ID: 140055.

item.title: CVE-2018-1969|2024-08-05T04:14:39.542Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager 6.0.0 allows the attacker to upload or transfer files of dangerous types that can be automatically processed within the product's environment. IBM X-Force ID: 153750.
